availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John S. Bohon (Wayne County, Kentucky, blacksmith)

body.p: Wayne County, Kentucky, blacksmith. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Hedrick Bohon. Owned one enslaved person in Wayne County in 1850. Blacksmith in Wayne County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer, District 2, p. 901. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Wayne, not stated, p. 237. Find A Grave, "Name (December 20, 1820-July 21, 1904)," Memorial #40697256, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/40697256 (accessed February 5, 2018).
